title: Weld and Fitzhugh on slavery - compare

content.prompt: The disagreements expressed in the two excerpts most directly reflect which of the following?

choices.label: Debates between management and unions over working conditions
Disputes between Jacksonian Democrats and Whigs
The intensification of regional differences between labor systems
The employment of immigrants in the North and South

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
